name: TowerAttack
description:
TowerAttack is a Free To Play full of action.

Make your way through enemy squadrons and towers to destroy the royal tower. Unlock new units and build the best team for each terrain! 

Game Design : ANTIPHON Hugues, DI NATALE Julien, EMERY Noé, ROSSEL Martin, VREL Eloïse

Gameplay Programmer : BOHIN Theophile, FALEMPIN Tom, RAYER Mattéo, SEGADO Valerian
